import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import logo1 from'./images/logo.png';import userIcon from'./images/user.png';import padlock from'./images/padlock 1.png';import kid from'./images/kid.png';import'./styles/register.css';import{UserContext}from'../UserContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterPage=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({login:'',password:''});const navigate=useNavigate();const{setUser}=useContext(UserContext);const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const formDataToSend=new FormData();formDataToSend.append('user_name',formData.login);formDataToSend.append('user_pass',formData.password);const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/register/',formDataToSend,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});console.log(response.data);alert('Registration successful!');setUser({name:formData.login});navigate('/main');// Перенаправление на главную страницу
}catch(error){console.error(error);alert('Registration failed!');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-side",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo1,alt:"Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"signup-line1-left",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"signup-line2-left",children:"Enter your name and password to register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"registration-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:userIcon,alt:"User",className:"icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"login",children:"Login:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"login",name:"login",className:"line-form",value:formData.login,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:padlock,alt:"Padlock",className:"icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",className:"line-form",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Registration"})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right-side",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:kid,alt:"Kid",className:"kid-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"signup-line1",children:"Sign Up to name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"signup-line2",children:"and enjoy"})]})]})]});};export default RegisterPage;
